attributes.action: abolish community support officers and encourage existing CSO's to retrain as police officers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the public are sick and tired of poorly trained, uppity, authoritative Community Support Officers treating the public with contempt and would prefer that their role was removed and replaced with more actual police officers with real power and excellent training.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/QualityPolicing/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
